description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a type of clinical document. These will form part of the NHS dm+d. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'TBC' subset with subset original id TBC; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'TBC' with Refset Id TBC.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
